definitions.definition: a competition in which all the competitors try to be the fastest and to finish first:
examples: Do you know who won/lost the race?

definitions.definition: an attempt to be the first to do or to get something:
examples: Kieran and Andrew are in a race for promotion.

definitions.definition: a series of horse races in a particular place on one day:
examples: He often has a day at the races.

definitions.definition: to (cause to) compete in a race:
examples: He has been racing for over ten years.
